summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2017 HARLEY-DAVIDSON FLHTCUTG. THE CONTACT RECEIVED NOTIFICATION OF NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 18V734000 (POWER TRAIN). THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE MANUFACTURER EXCEEDED A REASONABLE AMOUNT OF TIME FOR THE RECALL REPAIR. MCMAHON'S CYCLE SALES INC. (613 7TH AVE, BEAVER FALLS, PA 15010, (724)-846-6251) WAS CONTACTED AND CONFIRMED THAT THE PARTS WERE NOT AVAILABLE FOR THE RECALL REMEDY. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT MADE AWARE OF THE ISSUE. THE CONTACT HAD NOT EXPERIENCED A FAILURE. PARTS DISTRIBUTION DISCONNECT.

TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2017 HARLEY-DAVIDSON TRI GLIDE (FLHTCUTG). THE CONTACT RECEIVED NOTIFICATION OF NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 18V734000 (POWER TRAIN). THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE MANUFACTURER EXCEEDED A REASONABLE AMOUNT OF TIME FOR THE RECALL REPAIR. THE CONTACT CALLED FORT BRAGG HARLEY-DAVIDSON AT (910) 864-1200 (LOCATED AT 3950 SYCAMORE DAIRY RD, FAYETTEVILLE, NC 28303) AND WAS INFORMED THAT THE PART WAS NOT AVAILABLE. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT MADE AWARE OF THE ISSUE. THE CONTACT HAD NOT EXPERIENCED A FAILURE. PARTS DISTRIBUTION DISCONNECT.

OIL PRESSURE SWITCH WORKED IT'S WAY OUT ONLY INDICATING LOW PRESSURE BY THE TIME WHILE RIDING. I GOT IT TO MY DEALER AFTER THEY TOLD ME TO BRING IT IN WHEN PARKED THE SWITCH WAS OUT FAR ENOUGH TO CAUSE THE OIL TO POUR OUT. IF THIS HAD HAPPEND WHEN RIDING IN MY OPINION THE ENGINE WOULD SIEZE CAUSING THE WHEELS TO LOCK AND THROW THE RIDER OFF THE MOTOR CYCLE CAUSING SERIOS INJURY OR DEATH TO THE RIDER AND CAUSING AN ACCIDENT OF THE VEHICLES BEHIND. THIS IS ON THE NEW MILWALKEE 8 ENGINE. HAVE READ COMPLAINT OF THE FAILURE BUT NOT ON IT WORKING IT'S WAY OUT. NOTIFIED HARLEY DAVIDSON REQUESTED AN ENGINEER BE SENT TO LOOK AT THIS PROBLEM,WAITING ON A REPLY

TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2017 HARLEY-DAVIDSON FLHTCUTG. THE CONTACT RECEIVED NOTIFICATION OF NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 18V734000 (POWER TRAIN). THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE MANUFACTURER EXCEEDED A REASONABLE AMOUNT OF TIME FOR THE RECALL REPAIR. FORT WORTH HARLEY-DAVIDSON (3025 W LOOP 820 S, FORT WORTH, TX 76116, (855) 897-2953) WAS CONTACTED AND CONFIRMED THAT THE PARTS WERE NOT AVAILABLE FOR THE RECALL REMEDY. THE MANUFACTURER WAS MADE AWARE OF THE ISSUE AND WAS NOT ABLE TO CONFIRM WHEN THE PARTS WERE TO BECOME AVAILABLE. THE CONTACT HAD NOT EXPERIENCED A FAILURE. PARTS DISTRIBUTION DISCONNECT.

HARLEY DAVIDSON RECALL # 0173  I HAD WENT TO THE HD DEALER WHEN I FOUND OUT ABOUT THE RECALL, I HAD THE SERVICE DEPARTMENT LOOK UP MY VIN TO VERIFY THAT IT WAS IN THE RECALL, THEY SAID IT WAS, THEY WROTE UP A SERVICE TICKET FOR THE RECALL, I WENT AND CHECKED ON THE STATUS OF THE PARTS TODAY, I WAS TOLD THAT HARLEY DAVISON WON'T LET THE DEALER ORDER THE PARTS, THEY ALSO STATED THAT THEY ONLY GOT 1 KIT, AND THAT KIT WAS FOR A NEW MOTORCYCLE IN STOCK, THEY SAID THAT THEY COULD NOT SELL THE BIKE UNTIL THE RECALL WAS DONE, SO THEY FIX THE BIKE FOR SALE, BUT THEY ARE LETTING ALL THE CUSTOMER THAT HAVE BIKES UNDER RECALL WAIT ON PARTS, SO WHEN WILL THE PARTS BE AVAILABLE, WE ARE SUPPOSED TO JUST TAKE OUR CHANCES RIDING THE MOTORCYCLES UNDER RECALL, IF THIS IS A SAFETY ISSUE, WHY ARE THE KITS NOT READILY AVAILABLE TO FIX THESE BIKES, BUT YET, THEY HAVE KITS FOR THE BIKES FOR SALE, THIS IS NOT RIGHT, WHAT CAN BE DONE TO SPEED UP THE PROCESS.

TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2017 HARLEY-DAVIDSON FLHTCUTG. WHILE PUSHING THE MOTORCYCLE OUT OF THE GARAGE WITHOUT STARTING THE ENGINE, A SCRAPING NOISE WAS HEARD COMING FROM THE REAR RIGHT BRAKE. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO MOTOWN HARLEY-DAVIDSON (14100 TELEGRAPH RD, TAYLOR, MI 48180, (734) 947-4647) WHERE IT WAS DIAGNOSED THAT THE REAR RIGHT ROTORS WERE HEAVILY SCORED AND NEEDED TO BE REPLACED. THE VEHICLE WAS REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE AND INFORMED THE CONTACT THAT THE VEHICLE WAS NOT UNDER WARRANTY. THE APPROXIMATE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 636. *TT    CONTACT NOTICED A NOISE THAT SOUNDED LIKE WORN PADS. HARLEY-DAVIDSON CREW HEARD NOISE AND AGREED. PREMATURE BRAKE PAD AND ROTOR WORN AT 636 MILES. *TT

TL* THE CONTACT OWNED A 2017 HARLEY-DAVIDSON FLHTCUTG. WHILE DRIVING APPROXIMATELY 52 MPH APPROACHING A TRAFFIC SIGNAL, THE RIDER IN FRONT OF THE CONTACT STOPPED SUDDENLY. THE CONTACT DOWNSHIFTED TWICE AND APPLIED BOTH BRAKES; HOWEVER, THE MOTORCYCLE DID NOT STOP AND THE FRONT END SNAPPED. WHEN THE BRAKES WERE APPLIED, THE MOTORCYCLE PULLED TO THE LEFT AND COLLIDED WITH THE RIDER IN FRONT. THE MOTORCYCLE WAS THROWN TO THE GROUND ON THE LEFT SIDE OF THE ROAD. THE PASSENGER RIDING ON THE BACK OF THE CONTACT'S MOTORCYCLE WAS THROWN TO THE GROUND. THE PASSENGER WAS AIRLIFTED TO THE HOSPITAL AND DIED FROM SEVERE TRAUMA AND A HEART CONDITION. A POLICE REPORT WAS FILED. THE MOTORCYCLE WAS DESTROYED AND TOWED AWAY. THE MANUFACTURER AND DEALER WERE NOT CONTACTED. THE APPROXIMATE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 200.

EVERY NOW AND THEN THE ENGINE WILL STALL OUT DURING STOP & GO TRAFFIC OR WHEN YOU PULL INTO A PARKING LOT WITH THE CLUTCH PULLED IN & NO THROTTLE.  THIS HAS HAPPENED THREE TIMES IN THE LAST MONTH.  I HEAR BY INTERNET THREADS THAT HARLEY IS AWARE OF THIS SITUATION AND HAS CHOSEN NOT TO MAKE THIS PUBLIC TO OWNERS. DO WE WAIT TILL SOMEONE GETS KILLED TO ADDRESS THIS CRITICAL ISSUE?.

TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2017 HARLEY-DAVIDSON FLHTCUTG (TRI-GLIDE ULTRA). WHILE DRIVING 60 MPH, THE MOTORCYCLE VIBRATED AND JERKED EXCESSIVELY, CAUSING DISCOMFORT TO THE DRIVER AND PASSENGER. THE MOTORCYCLE ALSO BECAME EXTREMELY HOT, CAUSING MINOR BURNS TO THE CONTACT'S LEG. MEDICAL ATTENTION WAS NOT REQUIRED. THE MOTORCYCLE WAS TAKEN TO WAR HORSE HARLEY-DAVIDSON (5331 N US HWY 441, OCALA, FL 34475), BUT THE DEALER WAS UNABLE TO DIAGNOSE THE ISSUES. THE MOTORCYCLE WAS NOT REPAIRED AND THE FAILURES CONTINUED. THE MOTORCYCLE WAS TAKEN TO GATOR HARLEY-DAVIDSON (1745 U.S. HWY 441, LEESBURG, FL 34748), BUT THE DEALER WAS UNABLE TO DIAGNOSE THE CAUSE OF THE FAILURE AGAIN. THE MOTORCYCLE WAS NOT REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS MADE AWARE OF THE FAILURE AND FAILED TO ASSIST. THE APPROXIMATE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 30.

ON 06/03/2017 AT 7235 MILES THE CLUTCH FAILED TO DISENGAGE WHEN THE LEVER WAS PULLED.  THE VEHICLE WAS PARKED AND THE FAILURE WAS FOUND WHEN SHIFTING INTO FIRST GEAR.  THE TRIKE WAS TOWED TO THE SELLING HARLEY-DAVIDSON DEALERSHIP FOR REPAIR.  THE REPAIR MADE WAS: "FLUSHED THE CLUTCH DUE TO AIR IN THE LINE."    ON 06/09/2017 AT 7264 MILES THE CLUTCH FAILED TO DISENGAGE WHEN THE LEVER WAS PULLED.  THE VEHICLE WAS PARKED AND THE FAILURE WAS FOUND BEFORE SHIFTING INTO FIRST GEAR.  ATTACHED SHOULD BE PHOTOGRAPHS SHOWING THE CLUTCH LEVER BEING OPERATED WITH ONE FINGER WITHOUT ANY RESISTANCE.  I AM CONCERNED THIS FAILURE COULD HAPPEN WHEN THE VEHICLE IS IN MOTION.  THE CLUTCH FAILURE TO DISENGAGE COULD CAUSE A FATAL ACCIDENT.

STALLS WHEN AT IDLE OR SLOW MANOUVERING, RPMS ARE GOING FROM 1200 DOWN TO  300-0 CAUSING VEHICLE TO STALL. THIS A INTERMITTENT  PROBLEM AND A VERY DANGEROUS   SITUATION AT TIMES. HAVE TAKEN TO DEALER AND CALLED CORPORATE WITH A NO TROUBLE   FOUND.

TRYING TO GET SOMETHING DONE ABOUT A DEFECT WITH MY 2017 HARLEY-DAVIDSON TRI-GLIDE, BUT KEEP GETTING RUN AROUND FROM THEM. IT'S HARD TO TELL IN THE PIC BUT MY TRI-GLIDE SITS 3/8" LOWER IN THE REAR ON THE LEFT SIDE. TOOK THIS TO MY DEALERSHIP(COWBOY'S ALAMO CITY HARLEY) TO HAVE PROBLEM TAKEN CARE OF ONLY TO BE TOLD BY SVC DEPT THAT HARLEY-DAVIDSON IS AWARE OF THIS PROBLEM WITH THE TRIKES AND THE DIFFERENCE IS WITHIN SPECS. REALLY??? WITHIN SPECS?? THIS IS MY 2ND TRIKE AND 7TH HARLEY OVERALL. I BUY HARLEY BECAUSE OF REPUTATION AND THE FACT THAT THESE MOTORCYCLES ARE MADE IN AMERICA BY AMERICANS AND ARE REPRESENTATIVE OF AMERICAN MADE QUALITY. I BELIEVE THIS DISCREPANCY IN BALANCE SHOULD HAVE A ZERO INCH TOLERANCE! DO YOU THINK INDIAN, HONDA, YAMAHA, KAWASAKI WOULD ALLOW AN OBVIOUS FLAW TO BE LABELED "WITHIN SPECS"? I SERIOUSLY DOUBT IT!! I JUST WANT MY TRIKE TO SIT LEVEL. IT HAS BEEN POINTED OUT BY SEVERAL PEOPLE I RIDE WITH THAT THE TRIKE IS NOT LEVEL AND ASKED WHY HARLEY DIDN'T FIX THE PROBLEM. THAT'S MY QUESTION TOO! IF HARLEY IS AWARE OF THE PROBLEM, WHY WON'T THEY MAKE THE REPAIRS OR ADJUSTMENTS?
